Field Label:
Last Reviewed Date
Date when this center's data was last reviewed and/or updated
CENTER Record

Section Header: This record represents a unique data site/unique physical location of care -- active or formerly active -- in the IeDEA network. The fields below collect the variables in tblCENTER of the IeDEA Data Exchange Standard.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: AP, Asia-Pacific | NA, NA-ACCORD (North America) | CN, CCASAnet (Latin America) | CA, Central Africa | EA, East Africa | SA, Southern Africa | WA, West Africa
Field Note: Values: AP, EA, SA, WA, CA, CN, NA

Field Label:
CENTER
Code for Clinic/Centre/Hospital where patient is seen. Needs to be unique within each region.

PROGRAM
Care program with which the center is associated (if applicable)

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: ADULT, Adults (ADULT) | PED, Children (PED) | BOTH, Adults and children (BOTH)
1, Urban | 2, Mostly urban | 3, Mostly rural | 4, Rural | 9, Unknown
1, Health centre | 2, District hospital | 3, Regional, provincial or university hospital | 9, Unknown

Field Note: Coded as 3-letter ISO code (on back end)

Field Label:
Geocode - Latitude (GEOCODE_LAT)
Approximated geocodes (fewer decimal points) are acceptable. Example look-up website: iTouchMap

Database Open Date (OPEN_D)
(optional) earliest date for which data were included for this site

Site Inclusion Date (ADD_CENTER_D)
Date that the site was added to IeDEA

Site Exclusion date (DROP_CENTER_D)
Date that the site was dropped from IeDEA (if dropped)

SURVEY_INTERNET
Quality of Internet access for completing online surveys.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, sufficient   access to complete online surveys | 2, degraded access making online survey completion difficult | 3, no internet access | 9, Unknown

Field Label:
SURVEY_PAPER
Resources for printing and transferring paper surveys to a central location for data entry
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, site has resources to print and transfer surveys | 2, site has resources to print, but not to transfer surveys | 3, site does not have resources to print, but can transfer surveys | 4, site needs assistance in both printing and transferring surveys | 8, not applicable | 9, Unknown

Field Label: Supplemental Data (non-tblCENTER)

Site Display Name
The site's name is set as [name]. If you want a different name to appear on the IeDEA public website/map, list it here.

Hide this Site on Map
Can be used to hide sites on the iedea.org public map. Sites with a DROP_CENTER date will be automatically hidden.

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, No longer participating in IeDEA | 2, Interval cohort | 3, No direct contact with site | 4, Site declined participation | 99, Other

Field Label:
Site Assessment 1.0 ID
ID used in 2009 IeDEA site survey

Site Assessment 2.0 ID
ID used in 2014 IeDEA site survey

Site Assessment 3.0 ID
ID used in 2017 IeDEA site survey
